ValidationRule.description: If Recording Type is Audio & Web other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Recording_Type__c, 'Audio and Web') && ( ISPICKVAL(Recording_Started_Via__c , '') || ISPICKVAL(Player_Installed__c, '') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If your Recording Type is Audio & Web, then you must populate a value in the following fields: Player Installed, and Recording Started Via.
